name: Love Chan
description:
"Love Chan" is a touchable desktop pet, Can be placed anywhere on your computer desktop, The left mouse button can drag the character, the right mouse button can open the function menu, free to change !

Game features

  • Sexy character design
  • Dynamic character
  • Multiple characters
  • Multiple poses
  • Can attack character
  • Can touch character
  • Can adjust the touch range
  • Free movement
  • Free zoom
  • Powerful background rejection technology
